description.narrative: The aim of this project is Increased food security and livelihood opportunities and improved infant and young child feeding practices for targeted conflict-affected families and their children. The project will achieve this through increased access to a sufficient and nutritious diet strengthened/restored livelihood options for conflict affected people and improved access to infant and young child feeding services for the most vulnerable households in the target areas

mailing-address.narrative: 1 Saint Johns Lane, London EC1M 4AR, United Kingdom

description.narrative: Effective delivery of programme: delivering VFM , Protection mainstreaming and an inclusive response.
